projects.title: Lawli.ai - GPT-4 Legal Assistant
projects.description: Generated $200,000 in first-year revenue with 95% accuracy in legal advice and drafting. Utilized GPT-4 to automate legal document creation and review, demonstrating expertise in NLP and AI-driven automation.

projects.title: Azure AI Text Analytics Toolkit
projects.description: A Python-based toolkit leveraging Azure Cognitive Services for advanced text analysis, including sentiment analysis, entity recognition, and key phrase extraction. Ideal for e-discovery, customer feedback analysis, and social media monitoring.

projects.title: Azure AI RAG GPT
projects.description: A comprehensive Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) application built on Azure AI Studio, leveraging GPT-3.5 Turbo for enhanced conversational AI. Demonstrates end-to-end development, including prompt engineering, evaluation, and deployment automation.
